Amazing game i love it
Its amazing
Great game if you have high trust factor and prime.
its a good game but would not recommend solo queing in the competitive playlist

Every single time I log onto cs its a mind altering reality, im dragged into a game with 9 other people and forced to get along with spiraling serial killers who take there anger out on me every game 1/10 would not recommend this game to anyone save the space on your PC for Z1 Battle Royale comeback szn 2020 !!!

el juego esta guapisimo entretenido juegas con amigos solos etc gastas mucho dinero en cajas y en skins y luego en las cajas te toca una mierda y pierdes mucho dinero............................................................................................................................

Sem dúvida este é o jogo de FPS mais jogado no mundo. Para os fãs que jogam deis do 1.6, e que estão migrando para o CSGO, posso dizer que é um novo jogo. Após várias atualizações, a valve conseguiu torna-lo mais competitivo e estratégico. Apesar do jogo ser muito bom, existe um número imenso de hackers o que acaba estragando a diversão dos demais.
Mais pra quem curti o game existe várias plataformas que ajudam a inibir hackers e deixar o jogo perfeito como: Gamers Club, ESEA, FACEIT, DREAM TEAM entre outas.
Fun to play. Just like the old times. (-) the hackers :c

Well, it's Counter Strike . 
I mostly play competitive and I can say that it is fun until you meet toxic people . I have prime and hackers are pretty rare . 

BONUS: You will learn to speak fluently russian language in under 2 weeks .

Good game 10/10, took up most of my life but god dammit it was well worth it my wife left me because i gambled our wedding vows on this game and i won a damascus steel flip knife. My first sons nickname is dusty not because it sounded cool but because of the map De_dust II
